Text.val: 21.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
-- First compensate negative outstandings on individual client level
-- If compensation of negative outstandings on individual client level
remains still a negative outstanding, try to compensate on legal client level
-- Select corresponding VT04 row and eliminate the negative VT03 amount

SQL_STMT_U.val: DELETE FROM :1/VT03 WHERE VT03_DATE = ':2' and VT03_AMOUNTGNRL <= 0
DELETE FROM :1/VT04 WHERE VT04_DATE = ':2' and VT04_AMOUNTGNRL = 0
